27  package org.apache.http.impl.client.cache;
28  
29  import java.util.Map;
30  
31  import org.apache.commons.logging.Log;
32  import org.apache.commons.logging.LogFactory;
33  import org.apache.http.Header;
34  import org.apache.http.HeaderElement;
35  import org.apache.http.HttpRequest;
36  import org.apache.http.ProtocolException;
37  import org.apache.http.annotation.Immutable;
38  import org.apache.http.client.cache.HeaderConstants;
39  import org.apache.http.client.cache.HttpCacheEntry;
40  import org.apache.http.impl.client.RequestWrapper;
41  
42  /**
43   * @since 4.1
44   */
45  @Immutable
46  class ConditionalRequestBuilder {
47  
48      private static final Log log = LogFactory.getLog(ConditionalRequestBuilder.class);
49  
50      /**
51       * When a {@link HttpCacheEntry} is stale but 'might' be used as a response
52       * to an {@link HttpRequest} we will attempt to revalidate the entry with
53       * the origin.  Build the origin {@link HttpRequest} here and return it.
54       *
55       * @param request the original request from the caller
56       * @param cacheEntry the entry that needs to be re-validated
57       * @return the wrapped request
58       * @throws ProtocolException when I am unable to build a new origin request.
59       */
60      public HttpRequest buildConditionalRequest(HttpRequest request, HttpCacheEntry cacheEntry)
61              throws ProtocolException {
62          RequestWrapper wrapperRequest = new RequestWrapper(request);
63          wrapperRequest.resetHeaders();
64          Header eTag = cacheEntry.getFirstHeader(HeaderConstants.ETAG);
65          if (eTag != null) {
66              wrapperRequest.setHeader(HeaderConstants.IF_NONE_MATCH, eTag.getValue());
67          }
68          Header lastModified = cacheEntry.getFirstHeader(HeaderConstants.LAST_MODIFIED);
69          if (lastModified != null) {
70              wrapperRequest.setHeader(HeaderConstants.IF_MODIFIED_SINCE, lastModified.getValue());
71          }
72          boolean mustRevalidate = false;
73          for(Header h : cacheEntry.getHeaders(HeaderConstants.CACHE_CONTROL)) {
74              for(HeaderElement elt : h.getElements()) {
75                  if (HeaderConstants.CACHE_CONTROL_MUST_REVALIDATE.equalsIgnoreCase(elt.getName())
76                      || HeaderConstants.CACHE_CONTROL_PROXY_REVALIDATE.equalsIgnoreCase(elt.getName())) {
77                      mustRevalidate = true;
78                      break;
79                  }
80              }
81          }
82          if (mustRevalidate) {
83              wrapperRequest.addHeader(HeaderConstants.CACHE_CONTROL, HeaderConstants.CACHE_CONTROL_MAX_AGE + "=0");
84          }
85          return wrapperRequest;
86  
87      }
88  
89      /**
90       * When a {@link HttpCacheEntry} does not exist for a specific {@link HttpRequest}
91       * we attempt to see if an existing {@link HttpCacheEntry} is appropriate by building
92       * a conditional {@link HttpRequest} using the variants' ETag values.  If no such values
93       * exist, the request is unmodified
94       *
95       * @param request the original request from the caller
96       * @param variants
97       * @return the wrapped request
98       */
99      public HttpRequest buildConditionalRequestFromVariants(HttpRequest request,
100             Map<String, Variant> variants) {
101         RequestWrapper wrapperRequest;
102         try {
103             wrapperRequest = new RequestWrapper(request);
104         } catch (ProtocolException pe) {
105             log.warn("unable to build conditional request", pe);
106             return request;
107         }
108         wrapperRequest.resetHeaders();
109 
110         // we do not support partial content so all etags are used
111         StringBuilder etags = new StringBuilder();
112         boolean first = true;
113         for(String etag : variants.keySet()) {
114             if (!first) {
115                 etags.append(",");
116             }
117             first = false;
118             etags.append(etag);
119         }
120 
121         wrapperRequest.setHeader(HeaderConstants.IF_NONE_MATCH, etags.toString());
122         return wrapperRequest;
123     }
124 
125     /**
126      * Returns a request to unconditionally validate a cache entry with
127      * the origin. In certain cases (due to multiple intervening caches)
128      * our cache may actually receive a response to a normal conditional
129      * validation where the Date header is actually older than that of
130      * our current cache entry. In this case, the protocol recommendation
131      * is to retry the validation and force syncup with the origin.
132      * @param request client request we are trying to satisfy
133      * @param entry existing cache entry we are trying to validate
134      * @return an unconditional validation request
135      */
136     public HttpRequest buildUnconditionalRequest(HttpRequest request, HttpCacheEntry entry) {
137         RequestWrapper wrapped;
138         try {
139             wrapped = new RequestWrapper(request);
140         } catch (ProtocolException e) {
141             log.warn("unable to build proper unconditional request", e);
142             return request;
143         }
144         wrapped.resetHeaders();
145         wrapped.addHeader(HeaderConstants.CACHE_CONTROL,HeaderConstants.CACHE_CONTROL_NO_CACHE);
146         wrapped.addHeader(HeaderConstants.PRAGMA,HeaderConstants.CACHE_CONTROL_NO_CACHE);
147         wrapped.removeHeaders(HeaderConstants.IF_RANGE);
148         wrapped.removeHeaders(HeaderConstants.IF_MATCH);
149         wrapped.removeHeaders(HeaderConstants.IF_NONE_MATCH);
150         wrapped.removeHeaders(HeaderConstants.IF_UNMODIFIED_SINCE);
151         wrapped.removeHeaders(HeaderConstants.IF_MODIFIED_SINCE);
152         return wrapped;
153     }
154 
155 }
